preface.title: Summary
preface.para: The &project; project endeavors to develop practical software system components for application in a context of knowledge management, in the epoch of the emerging NewSpace industry.

sidebar.title: Commentary
sidebar.para: Considering the veritable wealth of practical knowledge resources currently available to current and future scientists and engineers with careers in and practical interests towards space science and space exploration, it's a broad field that the &project; project endeavors to address. This project proposes to address the material of fields in space-related science and engineering through a development of careful practice and documentation, in developing an emergent, adaptable, moreover transparent knowledge model, such that shall form the essential ontology core of the &project; project.
